entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `fileName` TEXT NOT NULL, `fileUri` TEXT NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL, `systemId` TEXT NOT NULL, `developer` TEXT, `coverFrontUrl` TEXT, `lastIndexedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `lastPlayedAt` INTEGER, `isFavorite` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_games_id
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_games_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id`)

indices.name: index_games_fileUri
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_games_fileUri` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`fileUri`)

indices.name: index_games_title
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_games_title` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`title`)

indices.name: index_games_systemId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_games_systemId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`systemId`)

indices.name: index_games_lastIndexedAt
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_games_lastIndexedAt` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`lastIndexedAt`)

indices.name: index_games_lastPlayedAt
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_games_lastPlayedAt` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`lastPlayedAt`)

indices.name: index_games_isFavorite
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_games_isFavorite` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`isFavorite`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `gameId` INTEGER NOT NULL, `fileName` TEXT NOT NULL, `fileUri` TEXT NOT NULL, `lastIndexedAt` INTEGER NOT NULL, `path` TEXT, FOREIGN KEY(`gameId`) REFERENCES `games`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_datafiles_id
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_datafiles_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id`)

indices.name: index_datafiles_fileUri
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_datafiles_fileUri` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`fileUri`)

indices.name: index_datafiles_gameId
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_datafiles_gameId` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`gameId`)

indices.name: index_datafiles_lastIndexedAt
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_datafiles_lastIndexedAt` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`lastIndexedAt`)
